flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Need a cheap stand for your iPhone 4, 4S or original iPhone?
guide.introduction_rendered:
Need a cheap stand for your iPhone 4, 4S or original iPhone?

Relevant parts
  • Empty Icebreakers Canister
  • iPhone 4, 4S or original iPhone

lines.text: Find an empty Ice Breakers mint canister.
lines.text_raw: Find an empty Ice Breakers mint canister.

lines.text: Open the large side of the Ice Breakers canister. Keep in mind that if the iPhone is in a case, it may not fit.
lines.text_raw: Open the large side of the Ice Breakers canister. Keep in mind that if the iPhone is in a case, it may not fit.

lines.text: Place iPhone in Ice Breakers canister.
lines.text_raw: Place iPhone in Ice Breakers canister.

guide.summary: Use an empty Ice Breakers canister as an iPhone stand. Works with the iPhone 4, 4S or original iPhone. The iPhone 3G and 3GS are a little too wide and won't quite fit.
guide.title: Ice Breakers Stand for iPhone 4, 4S, or Original iPhone
